name: Kingdom Clicker (itch)
description:
Click to produce
Click to upgrade
Click to manage workers
Click to populate

Click for glory and honour!

Made for #1BitClickerJam

Features:
1 Kingdom
5 Resources
2 glorious colors

Controls:
Mouse
RMB to switch music on and off

Game progress will be saved automatically

a game by
Sebastian Landinger (@landinger)
Waldemar Umaniz (@WowaTheU)

music by
mathgrant
